0: The inflatable Santas were put up months before Christmas so a toddler with brain cancer could enjoy the holiday spirit. But for the past week, the outdoor decorations in a Cincinnati-area neighborhood have been mysteriously slashed, damaged and vandalized, the police said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Residents started waiting up at night, keeping an eye out more during the day, and sharing messages on social media. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Then came a break in the case. The police said two boys, 16 and 17, were arrested and charged on Thursday with criminal damaging of an inflatable Santa on one property in the Colerain
